title: Open 2024 with a new skill thanks to Babbel Language Learning, now only $159.97.
content:
Macworld

As 2023 counts down its final days, we’re offering up some of our best deals of the year to reward all you bargain hunters looking to score before the new year arrives.

And since expanding one’s knowledge should definitely be on your New Year’s resolutions list, we suggest a lifetime subscription to the complete Babbel Language Learning program, now at an exclusive best-of-the-year price of only $159.97.

With over 10 million subscribers worldwide, Babbel is among the world’s leading apps for learning new languages, posting an impressive 4.6-star rating based on over 1.5 million reviews in the Apple App and Google Play stores.

Created by over 100 expert linguists, Babbel uses an immersive, practical method to teach 14 different languages, all at each learner’s unique pace. It features native speaker conversations about everyday topics like travel, family, business, and food with instruction that focuses on building a strong core vocabulary to accelerate language acquisition.

Lessons are broken into digestible 10-to-15-minute sessions, making it easy to fit learning into busy schedules. Meanwhile, personalized reviews assess progress using Babbel’s own proprietary speech recognition technology to customize training and address each learner’s strengths and weaknesses.

Right now, enjoy access to over 13,000 hours of training in all of Babbel’s languages, including Spanish, French, German, and more, at almost 75% off the regular price. 

If you get your purchase completed before 11:59 p.m. PT on January 2, the cost of your lifetime Babbel membership is just $159.97.
